Key Match Events: The Timberwolves held on late for a 104-97 victory over the Pelicans in the first game of a home back-to-back for New Orleans (7-30)
Pre-Game Insights: Based on NBA rules, New Orleans will submit their injury report by 1 p.m. this afternoon, which will finalize the status of Williamson for the second game of a back-to-back
Post-Match Reflections: Zion Williamson scored 22 points in 28 minutes against Minnesota
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans are back on the Smoothie King Center floor Wednesday, hosting Portland (12-23) at 7 p.m.
Others: On Western Conference Wednesday, the team to watch over the next seven days is Utah (9-26), the team just ahead of New Orleans in the standings
